alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:44PM EDT until July 24 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Delaware County in central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harvard, or 7 miles south of Walton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walton, Colchester, Hamden, Andes, Harvard, Downsville, Corbett, Russell Brook Campsite, Wolf Hollow and Beerston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
